resume.title: Resume
resume.name: Jason Han
resume.mainSubTitle: From Sales to Code: Uniting Varied Experience in Frontend Development
resume.content1.paragraph1:
I am a highly skilled Frontend Developer with a unique background spanning various fields, including sales, marketing, project management, professional day trading, and operating my own business for over 10 years. In the last two years, I have dedicated myself to honing my skills in JavaScript (ES6+), React framework, and Styled Components, resulting in proficiency in creating engaging designs and interactive functionalities for web applications.
My diverse experiences have equipped me with valuable transferable skills, such as effective communication, problem-solving, and adaptability, which I bring to my programming projects. My passion for technology drives me to continuously explore new advancements and trends, enabling me to identify efficient solutions for complex challenges.
Fluent in both Korean and English, having moved to Canada at a young age, I effectively communicate and connect with diverse teams and stakeholders. As a junior/intern Frontend Developer, I am eager to contribute my diverse skill set to innovative projects and further enhance my expertise in the programming world.
Thank you for considering my profile, and I look forward to discussing how my unique background can benefit your team.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.htmlSassLayout: Capable of implementing layouts and responsive web apps using HTML / SASS.
skills.styledComponents: Preventing styling bugs even when the app is extended, using Styled Components.

framework.statePropsComponent: Capable of designing React components and managing state and props.
framework.spaImplementation: Experienced in implementing Single Page Applications (SPAs) using React Router.
framework.optimizationExperience: Have experience in optimizing applications using React.memo, useMemo, and useCallback.
framework.reduxToolkit: Familiar with state management using Redux Toolkit.
framework.nextJsExperience: Developed server-side rendering and static website apps using Next.js.
framework.angularExperience: Worked on web applications using Angular for approximately 2 months.

project1.title: Personal Project
project1.subtitle: sexybrain.dev (Current Site)
description: I am developing this project from scratch without using any templates. The reason for this approach is that when I started developing with React, I wanted to understand how web apps like a blog function. I found that working on small projects and exploring the required skills efficiently helped me learn more than formal studying.

For styling, I initially used CSS, then briefly tried SASS, and later switched to Styled Components. Using Styled Components allows for easier maintenance and eliminates unexpected styling bugs, which is a significant advantage.
Backend is built with Firebase to enable features like login, posting, editing, and deleting.
- Posting page after login, Editing / Deleting
